    Established in 2016, Metropolis Clothing is an Australian brand of clothing inspired by historic fashions from Art Deco through to the Mid Century eras.
    Garments are made in Melbourne, Australia.
    I have been collecting and making vintage fashions for 35 years and I am passionate about vintage style.
    I offer the following services:
  • Clothing alterations and repairs,
  • Made to measure dressmaking,
  • Mens casual vintage made to measure,
  • Pattern making service (manual), and
  • CAD freelance.
